mapper.select: SELECT o.sales_out_code sales_out_code , p.prod_name prod_name , a.act_name act_name , o.sales_out_amt sales_out_amt , o.sales_out_date sales_out_date , i.sales_in_exd sales_in_exd FROM sales_out o JOIN com_prod p ON (o.prod_code = p.prod_code) JOIN com_act a ON (o.act_code = a.act_code) JOIN sales_in i ON (o.prod_code = i.prod_code) ORDER BY sales_out_code DESC
